title: Red tape may play spoilsport at new year's eve parties
description: "Most restaurants, pubs and bars in Delhi...are not planning any large-scale celebrations...because of the various administrative hassles in procuring multiple permissions and licenses," said Sandeep Anand Goyle, who heads Delhi chapter of National Restaurant Association of India (NRAI).
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
